author: aandvalenzuela
body:
This PR solves the DEVEL warnings on deprecated copy constructors present in the IBs on the `DataFormats/DTDigi` module.
The warnings are of this kind:
```
/data/cmsbld/jenkins/workspace/build-any-ib/w/tmp/BUILDROOT/f8389c2aa2be0093a1b6a4a0dc76f648/opt/cmssw/el8_amd64_gcc12/cms/cmssw/CMSSW_14_0_DEVEL_X_2023-11-19-2300/src/DataFormats/DTDigi/interface/DTDDUWords.h: In copy constructor 'DTROSWordType::DTROSWordType(const DTROSWordType&)':
  /data/cmsbld/jenkins/workspace/build-any-ib/w/tmp/BUILDROOT/f8389c2aa2be0093a1b6a4a0dc76f648/opt/cmssw/el8_amd64_gcc12/cms/cmssw/CMSSW_14_0_DEVEL_X_2023-11-19-2300/src/DataFormats/DTDigi/interface/DTDDUWords.h:93:53: warning: implicitly-declared 'constexpr DTROSWordType& DTROSWordType::operator=(const DTROSWordType&)' is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-copy]
    93 |   DTROSWordType(const DTROSWordType& obj) { *this = obj; }
      |                                                     ^~~
/data/cmsbld/jenkins/workspace/build-any-ib/w/tmp/BUILDROOT/f8389c2aa2be0093a1b6a4a0dc76f648/opt/cmssw/el8_amd64_gcc12/cms/cmssw/CMSSW_14_0_DEVEL_X_2023-11-19-2300/src/DataFormats/DTDigi/interface/DTDDUWords.h:93:3: note: because 'DTROSWordType' has user-provided 'DTROSWordType::DTROSWordType(const DTROSWordType&)'
   93 |   DTROSWordType(const DTROSWordType& obj) { *this = obj; }
      |   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
```

Thanks!
title: [SIMULATION] Fix DEVEL warnings on deprecated copy-constructors
